summary: AI & ML based Virtual Mouse web application with hand gesture control, 3D animated robot model on rotating table, real-time gesture detection, and voice feedback - renamed to Cyber Puppet
architectural_notes: Tech stack: Three.js (3D), MediaPipe Hands (gesture detection), Web Audio API (sound), Vanilla JavaScript
File structure: index.html, style.css, app.js, doll.js, gesture.js
GLTF model format for animated robot with skeletal animations
7 gesture patterns: index+middle+ring, index up, index+middle, thumbs up, closed fist, all 5 fingers, index+pinky
Real-time hand landmark tracking for cursor mapping
Camera permission flow with getUserMedia API

existing_features.title: Create a modern dark-themed homepage with a dark gradient background, featuring the centered title 'Control the Digital World with Your Hand Gestures' at the top
Display a centered animated 3D robot model using Three.js with a GLTF format, featuring smooth, rounded, futuristic design with glowing cyan/blue accents and skeletal animation support
Add a live camera canvas section below the 3D model showing a small preview box of the webcam feed
Implement an 'Enable Camera' button that properly requests webcam access using navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia with appropriate error handling for denied permissions
Integrate MediaPipe Hands library to detect hand gestures in real-time from the webcam feed, tracking hand landmarks and finger positions
Implement detection for index+middle+ring fingers up gesture that triggers 'I love you' voice feedback, makes the robot blink eyes, and moves the robot forward with smooth skeletal animation
Implement detection for index finger up gesture that triggers 'Yay' voice feedback and makes the robot jump with smooth skeletal animation
Implement detection for index+middle fingers up gesture that triggers 'Peace bro' voice feedback and makes the robot rotate with smooth skeletal animation
Implement detection for thumbs up gesture that triggers 'Good job' voice feedback and makes the robot shake its head with smooth skeletal animation
Implement detection for closed fist gesture that triggers 'Go fight' voice feedback and moves the robot forward with smooth skeletal animation
Implement detection for all five fingers up gesture that triggers 'Hi buddy' voice feedback and makes the robot wave its hands with smooth skeletal animation
Implement detection for index+pinky fingers up gesture that triggers 'Yo yo' voice feedback and makes the robot rotate its head with smooth skeletal animation
Implement sound feedback using Web Audio API that produces clear, audible voice output for each detected gesture
Display gesture status text above the camera canvas that updates in real-time to show the currently detected gesture
Add a 'Toggle Sound' button with glowing neon effect that enables or disables audio feedback
Add an 'Instructions' button with glowing neon effect that displays information about supported hand gestures and their corresponding actions
Implement a loading animation that displays while the 3D model and libraries are being initialized
Implement a floating virtual cursor that tracks and displays the index finger tip position on screen
Optimize the application for performance with FPS optimization, ensuring smooth rendering on both mobile and desktop screens
Change the main heading text from 'Control the Digital World with Your Hand Gestures' to 'Cyber Puppet'
Add a subheading 'Project by 2nd AIML Students' below the main heading
Replace the current 3D robot model with a more interactive style that features a rotating turntable/platform beneath the model
Update index finger up gesture to trigger 'yay' voice feedback and make the 3D model jump
Update index and middle fingers up gesture to trigger 'peace bro' voice feedback and make the 3D model rotate
Update index, middle, and ring fingers up gesture to trigger 'i love you' voice feedback and make the 3D model raise both hands
Update all five fingers up gesture to trigger 'hi buddy' voice feedback and make the 3D model wave its right hand
Update index and pinky fingers up gesture to trigger 'yo yo' voice feedback and make the 3D model move backward
Update thumbs up gesture to trigger 'good job' voice feedback and make the 3D model clap its hands
Update closed fist gesture to trigger 'come on fight' voice feedback and make the 3D model move forward
Update the instructions modal to reflect all new gesture mappings and their corresponding actions
